name: Pirate Hunter (itch)
description:
Use the A and D keys to move horizontally. Use the W key to speed up and D key to slow down. Use the left and right arrow keys to shoot cannon balls left and right respectively.

Goal: Destroy all the pirate ships in the game. If you die, you must restart the game. If you destroy all the pirate ships, you win.

Credits:

Game Made By D-Studios

Game Developer:

Devang Bhatnagar
